courseDetails.title: Portable Appliance Testing - PAT
courseDetails.shortDescription: Ensure Electrical Safety and Compliance: A Comprehensive Guide to Portable Appliance Testing (PAT) for Beginners
courseDetails.longDescription:
According to the Electricity at Work Regulations 1989, any electrical equipment that has the potential to cause injury must be maintained to a safe state. Portable Appliance Testing is one method of ensuring the safety of electrical equipment.


This comprehensive PAT Testing course is aimed to offer learners with the skills necessary to carry out theoretical understanding of electrical equipment testing. The course covers the necessary standards, test kinds and test equipment, results, and results recording.



Portable Appliance Testing (PAT) course will teach you how to test technical appliances: how to assess risks and manage them while conducting inspections. The course will familiarize you with safety protocols, how they work, and which ones must be followed when utilizing portable appliances.


Almost every office now has portable appliances. Portable Appliance Testing (PAT) will show you how to conduct frequent maintenance to avoid the potential problems that can occur.


Portable Appliance Testing (PAT) can be performed by anyone working in low-risk locations such as offices and shops to ensure that workplace and health procedures are followed. There is no prior training required, and you may begin immediately. The course will teach you the strategies and techniques for doing the many types of PAT examinations.


Note: This course is not appropriate for employees who work in environments rated as greater than low risk. This includes schools, gymnasiums, and any industrial facility. While we provide accurate advice, the responsibility lies with the individual conducting appliance testing to apply these techniques safely and confidently.


The Portable Appliance Testing Training Course is intended to familiarize you with testing technical appliances, as well as teach you how to assess and minimize risks, conduct inspections, and understand the safety procedures that must be followed when using portable appliances at work.
targetAudiences: Anyone interested in becoming trained in portable appliance testing
Electricians, technicians, and maintenance staff
Property owners, landlords, and business owners
Facilities managers and office maintenance staff
This course is not suitable for employees working in environments that are considered higher than low risk. This includes schools, gyms, and any industrial premises.

courseDetails.title: Creating & Animating Presentation Slides with AI
courseDetails.shortDescription: Generating presentation slides with AI, presenting slides with AI avatar, and conducting presentation in virtual reality
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Creating & Animating Presentation Slides with AI course. This is a comprehensive project based course where you will learn step by step on how to create and animate interactive presentation slides using AI. In addition, you will also learn how to make hyper realistic AI avatars that look like humans and they will read the presentation slides for you. Even more exciting, once the presentation is ready, you will do the presentations in virtual reality where you can invite people to join your metaverse. In the introduction session, you will learn how AI can help you to create presentation slides, for examples like generating designs, generating presentation contents, and animating the slides. Then, in the next session, you will continue by learning the ideal presentation structure, such as introduction, content overview, main body, conclusion and you will also get to know what components that should be included in each section. Afterward, you will enter the first project section where you will be guided step by step on how to generate compelling presentation slides using ten AI tools like Boardmix, Slides Pilot, GPT PPT, Plus Docs, Gamma, Tome, Slideoo AI, Power Mode AI, Magic Slides, and Send Steps. In this section, you will use those AI tools to generate presentation slides for a variety of purposes like creating market research reports, investor pitch, educational materials, consulting reports, and minimum viable products. Then, in the second project section, you will learn how to animate your presentation slides using an AI tool called Visme, you will specifically learn how to make a smooth transition from one slide to another slide. In the third section, you will learn how to utilize AI avatars to read your presentation slides and do the presentation on your behalf. In this section, you are going to use AI tools called Hour One AI and Colossyan. Meanwhile, in the last project section, you will learn how to do presentations in virtual reality using Framevr IO. This tool will enable you to do presentations in stunning metaverse and you can also do presentations in many different places, for example, like virtual offices, virtual classrooms, and outdoor theaters. Lastly, at the end of the course, you will also learn how to sell customizable presentation templates on Etsy and offer freelancing services to create custom presentations for your clients

Firstly, before getting into the course, we need to ask this question to ourselves: why should we utilize AI to create presentation slides?
